dmca.title: Copyright infringement on your site or site(s) hosted through you
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: S.Lediet [mailto:copyright@dateseeker.net] 
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 2004 9:18 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: postmaster@datinglobe.com
Subject: Copyright infringement on your site or site(s) hosted through you

 

Subject: Notice of Claimed Infringement
Date: November 30, 2004
From: copyright@dateseeker.net <mailto:copyright_dept@dateseeker.net>  
To: copyright@theplanet.com
CC: postmaster@datinglobe.com



Dear Lance Crosby, Esq. 

This message serves as legal notice that http://www.datinglobe.com/ of IP
Address (67.18.85.164 ) is using copyrighted works owned by myself (Suzanne
Lediet) without permission. This message meets all requirements for
compliance with a DMCA Cease & Desist request.

(i) My signature below serves as my legal electronic signature.

(ii) & (iii) The works being used are:

 

"American Singles"
Author: Suzanne Lediet
Violation:
http://www.datinglobe.com/american_singles.html

http://www.dateseeker.net/reviews/american_singles.html

Suzanne Lediet

(v) I do not authorize the use, publication, performance or redisplay of my
works without explicit permission. I have *not* shared usage rights for any
of my copyrighted reviews, or graphics for use on Datinglobe.com or any
other website owned or operated by Aleksei Prihodko . As no rights have been
given, this is a clear violation of my copyright.

(vi) The information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, I (Suzanne Lediet) am the exclusive owner of the rights for the
works listed above.

I appreciate your prompt response and action on this matter,

[signature]
Suzanne Lediet
http://dateseeker.net <http://dateseeker.net/>
